settings.label: Collections with from price
settings.info: A comma separated list of collection handles which should show a "from X" price on mobile instead of normal discount & full price.

settings.label: Collection URLs & Matching Variant List
settings.info: A comma separated list of collection URLs with an equals symbol '=' for which variant they should match to. Each set should be separated by a vertical line '|' character.

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Chargers with stand handles
settings.info: The product handles of the wireless chargers that requires a free stand to be bundled.

settings.label: Stand SKU
settings.info: The bundled wireless charger stand SKU.

settings.label: Stand Handle
settings.info: The bundled wireless charger stand product handle.

settings.label: Checkbox Text
settings.default: Our cases are seriously protective but they do not make your phone indestructible. Throwing, dropping or mis-treating phones in our cases can cause cracked screens and internal damage. Details of the product warranty are set out in our [Warranty=/pages/warranty] which apply to your purchase.
settings.info: To add a link, wrap linked word and link in square brackets and place the link after an equals character. eg. [link=/pages/warranty]
